**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 36 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 [Firebrand Bastion](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2439) **Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 53 **Perception** +29 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Kelish](/Languages.aspx?ID=38), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Osiriani](/Languages.aspx?ID=40) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +35, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +28, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +28, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +28, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +31, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +33, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +29 **Str** +6 **Dex** +2 **Con** +5 **Int** +2 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +1 **Items** [_arrow-catching shield_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=317) (Hardness 10^ HP 60^ BT 30), [javelins](/Weapons.aspx?ID=71) (4), _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [morningstar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=8)_, _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [studded leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)_ --- **AC** 41 (43 if shield raised) **Fort** +32 **Ref** +25 **Will** +29 **HP** 390 **Shoving Block** **Trigger** The Firebrand bastion uses the [Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32) reaction, and the opponent that triggered Shield Block is adjacent to the bastion and is the bastion's size or smaller; **Effect** The Firebrand bastion automatically [Shoves](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) the target of the Shield Block 10 feet. If this would cause the creature to hit an object, the creature takes 6 bludgeoning damage from the impact.
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32)**
**Shield Warden** When a Firebrand bastion has a shield raised, they can use their Shield Block reaction when an attack is made against an adjacent ally. If they do, the shield prevents that ally from taking damage instead of preventing the bastion from taking damage, following the normal rules for Shield block. --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** _morningstar_ +33 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 3d6+14 bludgeoning plus blessed armaments **Ranged** javelin +27 ([range increment 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 1d6+14 piercing plus blessed armaments **Battering Blow** The Firebrand bastion Strikes an adjacent creature, then [Shoves](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) the same creature. **Blessed Armaments** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) Weapons and shields wielded by the Firebrand bastion affect [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures with the effects of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune and deal an additional 3d6 positive damage. **Quick Shield Block** At the start of each of a Firebrand bastion's turns, the bastion gains an additional reaction they can use only to [Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=32).
name: Firebrand Bastion
